News.headline: West Ham United U23 v Leicester City U23 Postponed
News.page_title: West Ham United U23 v Leicester City U23 Postponed
News.URL_keywords: West Ham United U23 v Leicester City U23 Postponed
News.short_description: Tonight's Premier League Cup game between West Ham United U23 and Leicester City U23 has been postponed due to a frozen pitch
News.description:
With the Freezing weather affecting games all over the country over the weekend, today after an inspection of the pitch here at the Chigwell Construction Stadium it was deemed that the pitch was unplayable.

In light of this, a new date will be announced by West Ham in due course.

West Ham's U23 side will be back here on Friday night 7pm Kick-off, when they host Aston Villa U23 in their next Premier League 2 fixture. The West Ham side will be looking to take revenge on the Villains after their 2-0 defeat earlier in the season.

To see the full list of West Ham's U23 fixtures please click here.
